channel.title: New server - Extinction V3 -
channel.description:
hey guys, about 2 months ago chris remade one of the most well known rsps servers, extinction, we currently have a strong playerbase and are growing rapidly :) here are just a few of the features that this great server has :)
Features:
Pvm: -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen -queen black dragon -king black dragon -bork
PvP: -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking -ffa portal
Skilling: -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed -completionist cape awarded once 120 dungeoneering and 99 all stats.
Donatorzone: -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items -much more
Other information: -Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators) -fully functional grand exchange, and shops also -Home is edgeville, but may soon be changing. -Alot of custom items, such as black/rainbow/crayon/orange partyhat, and alot more! -Prestige system (with fixed shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk with working scroll maker. -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands
We are currently looking for staff on the server, be sure to come and check us out :) thanks -(player support) Mence
www.extinctionrsps.com

item.title: New server - Extinction V3 -
item.dc:creator: @Mence Mence
item.description:
@Mence wrote:

hey guys, about 2 months ago chris remade one of the most well known rsps servers, extinction, we currently have a strong playerbase and are growing rapidly here are just a few of the features that this great server has

Features:

Pvm:
-Nex
-Corp
-GWD (no killcount)
-Tormented Demons
-Evil Chickens
-Steel Kiwi Boss
-Nomad
-DKS
-Lucien
-Ice titans
-Sea Troll Queen
-queen black dragon
-king black dragon
-bork

PvP:
-Safe pvp
-Clan wars (safe/dangerous)
-Death Match Arena
-Wilderness Pking
-ffa portal

Skilling:
-Semi low Rate (Non combat)
-All skills avaliable
-Max cape rewarded when maxed
-completionist cape awarded once 120 dungeoneering and 99 all stats.

Donatorzone:
-Donator skilling zone
-Skilling benefits
-Donator Only Items
-much more

Other information:
-Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators)
-fully functional grand exchange, and shops also
-Home is edgeville, but may soon be changing.
-Alot of custom items, such as black/rainbow/crayon/orange partyhat, and alot more!
-Prestige system (with fixed shops)
-Custom Clothes Changer
-Custom Clothes Colour Changer
-Full Summoning obelisk with working scroll maker.
-Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE)
-Custom emote commands

We are currently looking for staff on the server, be sure to come and check us out thanks
-(player support) Mence

www.extinctionrsps.com
